00698 #define EXPR_IS_MEASURABLE(x)      (((SUPPL_OP( x->suppl ) != EXP_OP_STATIC) && \
00699                                      (SUPPL_OP( x->suppl ) != EXP_OP_LAST) && \
00700                                      (SUPPL_OP( x->suppl ) != EXP_OP_LIST) && \
00701                                      (SUPPL_OP( x->suppl ) != EXP_OP_COND_SEL) && \
00702                                      (SUPPL_OP( x->suppl ) != EXP_OP_CASE) && \
00703                                      (SUPPL_OP( x->suppl ) != EXP_OP_CASEX) && \
00704                                      (SUPPL_OP( x->suppl ) != EXP_OP_CASEZ) && \
00705                                      (SUPPL_OP( x->suppl ) != EXP_OP_DEFAULT) && \
00706                                      (SUPPL_OP( x->suppl ) != EXP_OP_PARAM) && \
00707                                      (SUPPL_OP( x->suppl ) != EXP_OP_PARAM_SBIT) && \
00708                                      (SUPPL_OP( x->suppl ) != EXP_OP_PARAM_MBIT) && \
00709                                      (SUPPL_OP( x->suppl ) != EXP_OP_DELAY) && \
00710                                      !((SUPPL_IS_ROOT( x->suppl ) == 0) && \
00711                                        ((SUPPL_OP( x->suppl ) == EXP_OP_SIG) || \
00712                                         (SUPPL_OP( x->suppl ) == EXP_OP_SBIT_SEL) || \
00713                                         (SUPPL_OP( x->suppl ) == EXP_OP_MBIT_SEL)) && \
00714                                        (SUPPL_OP( x->parent->expr->suppl ) != EXP_OP_COND))) ? 1 : 0)
00715 
00720 #define EXPR_IS_STATIC(x)        ((SUPPL_OP( x->suppl ) == EXP_OP_STATIC)     || \
00721                                   (SUPPL_OP( x->suppl ) == EXP_OP_PARAM)      || \
00722                                   (SUPPL_OP( x->suppl ) == EXP_OP_PARAM_SBIT) || \
00723                                   (SUPPL_OP( x->suppl ) == EXP_OP_PARAM_MBIT))
00724 
00729 #define EXPR_COMB_MISSED(x)        (EXPR_IS_MEASURABLE( x ) & \
00730                                     ~expression_is_static_only( x ) & \
00731                                     (~SUPPL_WAS_TRUE( x->suppl ) | ~SUPPL_WAS_FALSE( x->suppl )))

01319  $Log$
01320  Revision 1.70  2003/08/10 03:50:10  phase1geo
01321  More development documentation updates.  All global variables are now
01322  documented correctly.  Also fixed some generated documentation warnings.
01323  Removed some unnecessary global variables.
01324 
01325  Revision 1.69  2003/08/05 20:25:05  phase1geo
01326  Fixing non-blocking bug and updating regression files according to the fix.
01327  Also added function vector_is_unknown() which can be called before making
01328  a call to vector_to_int() which will eleviate any X/Z-values causing problems
01329  with this conversion.  Additionally, the real1.1 regression report files were
01330  updated.
01331 
01332  Revision 1.68  2003/02/27 03:41:56  phase1geo
01333  More development documentation updates.
01334 
01335  Revision 1.67  2003/02/13 23:44:08  phase1geo
01336  Tentative fix for VCD file reading.  Not sure if it works correctly when
01337  original signal LSB is != 0.  Icarus Verilog testsuite passes.
01338 
01339  Revision 1.66  2003/02/12 14:56:22  phase1geo
01340  Adding info.c and info.h files to handle new general information line in
01341  CDD file.  Support for this new feature is not complete at this time.
01342 
01343  Revision 1.65  2003/02/07 23:12:30  phase1geo
01344  Optimizing db_add_statement function to avoid memory errors.  Adding check
01345  for -i option to avoid user error.
01346 
01347  Revision 1.64  2003/01/04 09:25:15  phase1geo
01348  Fixing file search algorithm to fix bug where unexpected module that was
01349  ignored cannot be found.  Added instance7.v diagnostic to verify appropriate
01350  handling of this problem.  Added tree.c and tree.h and removed define_t
01351  structure in lexer.
01352 
01353  Revision 1.63  2003/01/03 05:52:01  phase1geo
01354  Adding code to help safeguard from segmentation faults due to array overflow
01355  in VCD parser and symtable.  Reorganized code for symtable symbol lookup and
01356  value assignment.
01357 
01358  Revision 1.62  2002/12/07 17:46:52  phase1geo
01359  Fixing bug with handling memory declarations.  Added diagnostic to verify
01360  that memory declarations are handled properly.  Fixed bug with infinite
01361  looping in statement_connect function and optimized this part of the score
01362  command.  Added diagnostic to verify this fix (always9.v).  Fixed bug in
01363  report command with ordering of lines and combinational logic verbose output.
01364  This is now fixed correctly.
01365 
01366  Revision 1.61  2002/12/06 02:18:59  phase1geo
01367  Fixing bug with calculating list and concatenation lengths when MBIT_SEL
01368  expressions were included.  Also modified file parsing algorithm to be
